p: A linear mixed model was used to assess the fixed effect of evolutionary history (historical contingency) and random effect of lineage on viral fitness at the final passage of the experimental evolution at 40°C (PROC MIXED, SAS Institute 2004). One‐way ANOVA and Welch two‐sample t test were used for other comparisons (R v. 3.4.0, R Core Team, 2017; Prism 8 v. 8.0.2, GraphPad Software Inc.).
